description: man striding in center of image with a pole and a tiny flag attached to the end of it; houses and trees surround him in the background; a sun is setting in the upper right corner
inscription: LLC in plate: 1919 | LLC of sheet, in pencil: Dr. Rauert | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: W. Gramatté. Der grosse Irre E.129 | BC margin of sheet, in pencil: 523 | LRC of sheet, in pencil: 8- | LL margin of sheet in pencil, on verso: Der große Irre mit der Fahne
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Gramatté / 19
title: The Great Madman with the Flag
